Uses of Package
structure

  • Packages that use structure 
    Package Description
    dbms  
    manageDatabase.expression  
    manageDatabase.query  
    structure  
  • Classes in structure used by dbms 
    Class and Description
    Table
    Table structure which defined a table in DBMS Each table contains: 1. table name 2. attributes (list structure) 3. primary position table (each element indicate the position of primary attribute) 4. attribute position table (hash attribute name with position) 5. !
    Tuple
    Self-defined class of an ArrayList of Value
    Add something more row view
    Value
    Value implement Serializable
    this structure is the basic data element in database

    Table
    Table structure which defined a table in DBMS Each table contains: 1. table name 2. attributes (list structure) 3. primary position table (each element indicate the position of primary attribute) 4. attribute position table (hash attribute name with position) 5. !
  • Classes in structure used by structure 
    Class and Description
    Attribute

    Contains:
    1.attribute name
    2.type
    3.length for varchar
    4.column list
    5.primary or not
    Attribute.Type
    The type of the data to be stored
    1. int: integer
    2. varchar: string
    3. null: empty value
    ForeignReference 
    Tuple
    Self-defined class of an ArrayList of Value
    Add something more row view
    TupleStack
    The space to store all tuples, which have column view * row view
    Value

    this structure is the basic data element in database
